attributes.action: Scrap the Biometric Chips passports scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Biometric Chip is now a standard component of any UK passport, intended to ease identification. The chip is vunerable to data theft, as it can be read by anybody with the right equipment and has even been proven to be duplicated without much difficulty, and will hense not prevent forgery.
The chip is far too vunerable, and provides too much scope for would-be data criminals. What is the point? Please ban the use of Biometric Chips in UK passports.
